Title: Tentacle Prawn: (Actually) A Cthulhu Dating Sim
Description: It's got action! It's got romance! In this RPG-Dating Sim, gather your party and try to settle a centuries-old dispute among your monster and human classmates! The fate of Winter Prom is at stake!

Title: TOP DOG
Description: üí• Dogfight your way through endless waves of enemies ‚¨ÜÔ∏è Rank-up and upgrade your aircraft mid-flight üèÜ Compete on the daily leaderboards üïπÔ∏è Easy to pickup üé≤ Short and randomized runs üíª Minimum requirements

Title: Fairy Fencer F: Refrain Chord
Description: Help Fang and the gang harness the power of song in this comedic tactical RPG romp.

Title: Strategic Mind: Spirit of Liberty - Prologue 1939
Description: Strategic Mind: Spirit of Liberty is a history-driven turn-based strategy set in WW2. Lead the scarce Finnish forces through the Winter War, Continuation War, and Lapland War. Save your country‚Äôs very existence from the Red Menace. Niet Molotoff!

Title: 3D PUZZLE - LAST OF CITY
Description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

Title: Raventure
Description: In Raventure, you play as a brave warrior on a perilous journey across a scorching desert.

Title: CONVERGENCE: A League of Legends Story‚Ñ¢
Description: Traverse the sprawling city of Zaun as Ekko, a young inventor with a device to manipulate time, in this story-driven action platformer. Collect parts, craft gadgets, and unlock abilities‚Äîthen rewind time to adapt your approach to every new challenge.

Title: Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun
Description: Load up your Boltgun and unleash the awesome Space Marine arsenal to blast your way through an explosion of sprites, pixels and blood in a perfect blend of Warhammer 40,000, frenetic gameplay and the stylish visuals of 90‚Äôs retro shooters.

Title: Magic: The Gathering Arena
Description: Magic: The Gathering Arena empowers you to discover your strategy, meet the planeswalkers, explore the multiverse, and battle friends around the world. Start playing for free, challenge your friends, unlock cards, and feel the magic of the original fantasy CCG!

Title: Spherum Volumetric Player
Description: Spherum Volumetric Player metaverse! A whole VR-city, Volumetric avatars, free movement, interactive live objects,¬† and more. Spherum Volumetric Player metaverse enable users to curate, discover, and explore meaningful interactions on the metaverse in a way that was not possible before metaverse!

Title: Mystery Case Files: Incident at Pendle Tower
Description: Pendle Tower was once a lavish high-rise hotel, but a new renovation has awakened a long-dormant secret within its foreboding halls.

Title: 3D PUZZLE - PORT
Description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

Title: Turbo Shell
Description: Turbo Shell is a fast-paced precision platformer where, instead of running and jumping, you push and pull yourself to get ahead at high-speed. The more skilfully you master this unique mechanic, the quicker you‚Äôll conquer ever more challenging levels - and reach your goal in record time.

Title: After Us
Description: Explore the corners of a surrealistic post-human world to give life on Earth a second chance in this touching story about sacrifice and hope.

Title: Blooming Business: Casino
Description: Blooming Business: Casino is a business tycoon sim with a narrative twist. Build and run your own fantasy casino in a bustling world full of animals, drama and danger.

Title: Planet of Lana
Description: A young girl and her loyal friend embark on a rescue mission through a colorful world full of cold machines and unfamiliar creatures. Planet of Lana is a cinematic puzzle adventure framed by an epic sci-fi saga that stretches across centuries and galaxies.

Title: Miasma Chronicles
Description: From the creators of Mutant Year Zero: Road to Eden comes a beautifully crafted tactical adventure you won‚Äôt forget. Embark on a quest across a post-apocalyptic wasteland torn apart by a savage force known only as the ‚ÄòMiasma‚Äô.

Title: Runner Roy
Description: Runner Roy is a sidescroller platformer where you have to count both on your skills and luck to overcome (and survive!) as many machines and obstacles along the way as you can.

Title: Trials of Kokoro
Description: In this Visual Novel RPG, you will customize a group of heroes' equipment and skills before leading them into strategic battles. An emotional storyline merges with exciting, turn-based combat and party management in this epic adventure across the continent of Vitaria.

Title: Pixel Starships
Description: Pixel Starships is the world‚Äôs first total spaceship management game in an 8bit massive online universe. In Pixel Starships, you command every aspect of your ship from construction to battles in a single persistent world. PSS is Community driven and crowdfunded.

Title: Bread & Fred
Description: Grab your best bud for help in this new co-op challenge to help two adorable penguins, Bread and Fred, reach the top of the snowy summit. Time your jumps, cling to walls and swing across gaps to see how far you can make it before you tumble all the way back down the mountain.

Title: Birds Aren't Real
Description: A short story-driven psychological horror game. No visual jumpscares; only mentally disturbing.

Title: Liberte
Description: Libert√© is a deck-builder roguelite inspired by the French Revolution and body horror. Brave the war-torn streets as Rene - a regular Parisian entangled in a civil war caused by a cryptic invader from another dimension, Lady Bliss. Collect cards, nurture alliances, and try to stay alive!

Title: Medved Hellraiser
Description: You are the only one who can restore order to the world! Arm yourself and stop this madness using your shooting potential.

Title: Cosmic Overdrive
Description: Cosmic Overdrive brings fast-paced rounds of a VR sci-fi runner that prioritizes comfort, immersion and engagement. Physically maneuver your spacecraft with interactive machinery. Fly cautiously to survive, but not so cautiously that the portal closes before you can make it through.

Title: Kingmaker Academy: Warrior's Duels
Description: Dear warriors of the Kingmaker Academy! Face your talented colleagues in challenging duels at our school‚Äôs most important tournament! Improve your skills with each duel, become the king of warriors and rule the school. But beware, remember it‚Äôs a roguelike! You dont want to be eliminated, do you?!

Title: HeliVR Simulator
Description: With intuitive controls, effortlessly take off and master helicopter flying, saving yourself countless hours of practice. So, put on your headset, get comfortable, and enjoy the seamless experience!

Title: Lord of the Click: Interstellar Wars
Description: Let‚Äôs do it once more, people! New chapter of the critically acclaimed Lord of the Click series is finally here. And it's tetralogy now meaning we‚Äôre done with the trilogy thing and up for something bigger. Interstellar Wars take the neverending conflict to a whole new level ‚Äî in space!

Title: Triad Ball
Description: In NeoFuturistTown, anarchy reigns. The underworld barons have taken control and are fighting for territory. To put an end to these confrontations, a brilliant inventor proposed to settle the conflicts by triad matches. A sport created by this man of science.

Title: Mr.T Survival
Description: Mr.T Survival is a survival game set in the wild jungle of nature. Players take on the role of Mr.T, a backpacker on his travel journey who encounters an accident that leaves him stranded on a remote and unfamiliar island. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style

Title: Annie and the AI
Description: Step into the role of Esme, an AI built by Annie but built for what purpose? Evolve and learn by solving visual puzzles accompanied by beautiful hand-drawn artwork. Learn all about Annie's life, befriend her, and grow together.

Title: The Mage
Description: Casual 2D puzzle platformer game that will transport you to a world of magic. Play as a powerful mage on a quest to save his King from a dark and malevolent force that threatens to destroy everything in its path.

Title: Glitch Busters: Stuck On You
Description: It‚Äôs a normal day on the net, until a virus outbreak turns everything upside-down. Only your squad of GLITCH BUSTERS can take on the net‚Äôs kookiest bugs in an online world gone haywire in this 1-4 player co-op 3rd person shooter.

Title: Dawn vs Dusk
Description: An over the shoulder arena battle multiplayer game. Battle as either the Dawn or Dusk teams for supremacy of the arena by holding capture points with your team mates. Last team standing at 20 minutes wins the game!

Title: Prime Directive
Description: Prime Directive is a first person 3D action-adventure shooter in which players control Marty, a small but brave robot. Marty acquires unique abilities to fight enemies and solve puzzles while exploring a mysterious alien world.

Title: Dizzy Rogues
Description: Dizzy Rogues is an auto-runner roguelike with "turn" based combat. Bounce your weapon off enemies and objects, rack up your combo, and purchase unique items.

Title: Ketamina
Description: "Ketamine" is a First-Person game in which you need to uncover why you woke up without any memory in an apparently unremarkable apartment, until you discover the secrets of the resident and consider whether you really want to stay or leave.

Title: Future Racer 2000
Description: Only You Can Be The Future Racer 2000

Title: Zone VX
Description: Upgrade, fight, and survive against an unrelenting enemy onslaught in this adrenaline-fueled vehicle combat roguelike. How long can you stay alive?

Title: Caveman Ransom
Description: A fun 16-bit style platformer where you play a caveman fighting against bandits and dinosaurs. It is perfect for carefree gaming and a must for kids as well as for those who want to experience that 1990s nostalgia!

Title: The Last Survivors
Description: Kill the zombies and take on challenges by helping the last survivors in the city. The Last Survivors is a fun roguelite action game with an infinite power-up experience that is repeatable every time you play. Never stop, collect as much XP and Boosters to get stronger by choosing your upgrades.

Title: Wild Frontier
Description: Escape to an enchanting, living sandbox surrounded by wildlife and nature.

Title: Trans Neuronica
Description: LINK nodes; UNTANGLE paths; REBUILD memory; ASSESS humans; A puzzle where logic goes hand in hand with surgical precision and humans ask artificial intelligence for help. But only if you trust them enough.

Title: Animal Kostume
Description: No talk, compadre. It's Animal Kostume time! Follow kroc-boy in his path to overcome a series of difficult levels in this hardcore 2D platformer with a lot of enemies, bullets and surprises.

Title: Inkbound
Description: Inkbound reinvents turn-based gameplay in a fluid online-only co-op roguelike from the creators of Monster Train. Play solo or party up to dive into the magical, dangerous books of the Atheneum Library and fight to save this rich, ever-expanding world.

Title: Regenesis
Description: Guide a group of survivors trying to strive in this alien yet familiar environment. Fight against mutated creatures and use their parts to craft and upgrade your weapons.

Title: Cruel Reality: A horrible dream
Description: Horrible Dream - first of the Cruel Reality trilogy, a visual novel with elements of psychological horror.

Title: Survival: Lost Way
Description: Survival: Lost Way - is a sandbox game survival in an open post-apocalyptic world.

Title: Flying Carpets Over Shark Infested Waters
Description: Combat and survival. Escape from the Death Maze and from Rat Island. Defeat the pirates in aerial combat, while sharks swim below. Board the pirate ship and steal their gold. Everyone and everything is out to get you. Get them first. In the final scene find and terminate your nemesis. The parrots.

Title: Gun Knight All Day
Description: Gun Knight All Day is a close quarters bullet hell dungeon crawler about a knight who uses guns. Shoot, dodge, and scavenge your way through the procedurally generated dungeons one room at a time. Challenging boss fights test the sharpness of your skills and the lethality of your weapons.
